resolveDialog.title: Confirmation
resolveDialog.question: Have you created a new registration?
resolveDialog.helper: If not, click "Create registration". After creating the registration, return here and click "Save" to mark the task as completed.
resolveDialog.snackbarNoRegistration: There is no registration for this vehicle yet. Please create a registration before resolving the task.
resolveDialog.snackbarNoNewerRegistration: There is no newer registration for this vehicle. Please create a new registration before changing the status.
resolveDialog.snackbarRegistrationTooOld: The registration for this vehicle is older than the task deadline. Please renew or create a new registration and try again.
resolveDialog.snackbarResolved: The task has been marked as completed.

tooltip.selectVehicleAndDates: Select a vehicle and ensure dates exist

cancel.title: Cancel business trip
cancel.subtitle: Canceller {{id}}
cancel.previewSubtitle: This trip will be cancelled and removed from the approval flow.
cancel.helper: You can add a reason (optional). This action cannot be undone.

reject.title: Reject business trip
reject.subtitle: Rejector {{id}}
reject.previewSubtitle: Review the dates and provide a reason for rejection.
reject.helper: Please provide a short reason. This will be saved with the trip.
reject.placeholder: e.g. Dates conflict / Missing info / Policy reason…
reject.note: Note: rejecting will notify the requester and stop the approval flow.
